test/fixtures/type-error/global-assignment.ro
    1│ type i32
    2│ type f32
    3│ 
    4│ var x = 1
    5│ 
    6│ fun addOne(): i32 = {
    7│   x = x + 1.0
     │       ^^^^^^^ Could not find a valid overload for function of type fun(lhs: u32, rhs: u32) -> u32 & fun(lhs: i32, rhs: i32) -> i32 & fun(lhs: u64, rhs: u64) -> u64 & fun(lhs: i64, rhs: i64) -> i64 & fun(lhs: f32, rhs: f32) -> f32 & fun(lhs: f64, rhs: f64) -> f64 with the arguments of type (i32, f32)
     │         ^ Error with "+"
     │       ^^^^^^^ Type mismatch: Type "INVALID_TYPE" is not assignable to "i32"
    8│ }
